P3

接口 Game

  • 所有超级接口:
    Action
    所有已知实现类:
    chessGame, goGame

    public interface Game
extends Action
    作者:
    Shen

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean checkPosition(Position position)
      Check the piece in the position of board.
      Board getBoard()
      Get board
      Player getOpponent(java.lang.String name)
      get the opponent player
      Player getPlayer1()
      Get player1
      Player getPlayer2()
      Get player2

      • 从接口继承的方法 P3.Action

        kill, move

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkPosition

        boolean checkPosition(Position position)
        Check the piece in the position of board.
        参数:
        position - a position to check
        返回:
        true if position is valid, else false

      • getBoard

        Board getBoard()
        Get board
        返回:
        a copy of game's board

      • getPlayer1

        Player getPlayer1()
        Get player1
        返回:
        a copy of game's player1

      • getPlayer2

        Player getPlayer2()
        Get player2
        返回:
        a copy of game's player2

      • getOpponent

        Player getOpponent(java.lang.String name)
        get the opponent player
        参数:
        name - a player's name, assume it should be opponent's
        返回:
        a player who is opponent against the player "name", return null if no such player
